hero.description: Full-width hero with background image, left-aligned gradient overlay, headline, description, primary CTA button, and pagination dots

fund-1-multi-asset.description: Light-background fund showcase section with fund name, description, underlined CTA link, and two team member portraits

fund-2-sa-equity.description: Dark-background fund showcase section with white text, fund details, and two team member portraits

fund-3-global-equity.description: Light-background fund showcase section with a single team member portrait

fund-4-sa-global-financials.description: Dark-background fund showcase section with a single team member portrait

fund-5-partner-fund.description: Light-background fund section with partner logo instead of team members

footer.description: Dark footer with four-column grid: brand logo with social icons, quick links, legal links, and newsletter subscribe form with copyright bar

--primary-color.description: Primary brand color (vibrant orange) used for CTAs, links, and accents

--secondary-color.description: Secondary brand color (near-black) used for dark section backgrounds

--accent-color.description: Accent color (darker orange) used for hover states and the subscribe button

--surface-color.description: Surface/card color (white) used for header background and light text on dark

--text-color.description: Primary text color (dark charcoal) for body text on light backgrounds

--text-light.description: Light text color used for footer body text and input borders

--background-dark.description: Dark background for alternating fund sections and footer

--background-overlay-light.description: Light overlay applied to alternating light fund sections

--font-family.description: Primary font family used for all text throughout the template
